1618.Applications: 7010 A 1 is our cellulosic electrode for the vertical down welding of hot and filler passes as well as for capping of higher strength pipe steels particularly for API grades X56X60 or DIN grades StE 360.7 TM/StE 385.7 TM. In general the electrode is suited for root passes, however, in most cases even on higher strength pipes our 6010 is preferred.
